item.title: Report X-2025041613
item.description:
Report X-2025041613

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-01T01:13:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-18
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 4/17/2025 at approximately 2200 hours, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 301180 at the ramp facility in Newark, reporting a corrosive spill. The shipment consisted of 4 fiberboard boxes, each containing one plastic drum, one of which spilled from the closure. The cause was unknown. The entire shipment waits an amended shipper's declaration for further transport.
